      • init

        public boolean init(android.content.Context context,
                    java.lang.String vungleAppId)
        Initializes the Vungle Publisher SDK. You must call this method before calling playAd().
        Overrides:
        init in class com.vungle.publisher.VunglePubBase
        Parameters:
        context - the Android application context.
        vungleAppId - your app's Vungle ID as shown on the Vungle Dashboard.
        Returns:
        true if initialization was successful; otherwise, returns false.

      • addEventListeners

        public void addEventListeners(EventListener... eventListeners)

        Registers the input EventListeners if they have not already been registered. If an input EventListener equals a previously registered EventListener, it will not be registered a second time.

        N.B. This method has the potential to leak memory if you register a new EventListener on every call to Activity.onCreate(). Therefore, you should do one of the following:

        • call clearEventListeners() or removeEventListeners(EventListener...) in Activity.onDestroy()
        • call setEventListeners(EventListener...) instead of addEventListeners() in Activity.onCreate().
        Overrides:
        addEventListeners in class com.vungle.publisher.VunglePubBase
        Parameters:
        eventListeners - the EventListeners to add.
        See Also:
        clearEventListeners(), removeEventListeners(EventListener...), setEventListeners(EventListener...)

      • clearEventListeners

        public void clearEventListeners()
        Removes all EventListeners.
        Overrides:
        clearEventListeners in class com.vungle.publisher.VunglePubBase

      • setEventListeners

        public void setEventListeners(EventListener... eventListeners)
        Clears registered EventListeners and then adds the input eventListeners.
        Overrides:
        setEventListeners in class com.vungle.publisher.VunglePubBase
        Parameters:
        eventListeners - the EventListeners to register.

      • removeEventListeners

        public void removeEventListeners(EventListener... eventListeners)
        Removes the input EventListeners.
        Overrides:
        removeEventListeners in class com.vungle.publisher.VunglePubBase
        Parameters:
        eventListeners - the event listeners to remove.
